name: Intro
_source: # Battle where you destroy Lachesis's artifact
# Need to have recruited Raymond and beaten the precursor ruins to get here.
s;Enoch;You there.{w} Each step you take defiles Lady Lachesis's shrine.{w}{br}Leave now while you still can.
s;Raymond;Another recipient of Lachesis's "blessings" huh?{w}{br}Well, I'm not planning on leaving after spending so much time trying to break your damned seal.

s;Enoch;You dare defy her will?{w} You dare defy the shaper of fortune's currents?{w} You dare defy Lady Luck?{w} You dare defy the one who calculates chaos?{w}{br}Your folly and heresy will not go unpunished.
s;Raymond;Try us.{w} I've dreamed of shoving this cursed blade into Lachesis's chest for five damned years.{w}{br}You won't stand in our way.
s;Simon;How are we supposed to reach the abacus?{w}{br}It's protected by another layer of barriers?
s;Raymond;I think the bastard guarding this place has something to do with it.
s;Raymond;We take him out, and we likely have a shot at the abacus.
s;Simon;Lachesis won't like us killing one of her chosen though.{w}{br}We need to be ready to rush the abacus after we take him out.
s;Raymond;We need to get to him first.{w}{br}Lachesis will practically shower blessings on her cultists to stop us, turning luck in their favor.
s;Simon;What if we... intercepted those blessings?{w} Is that possible?
s;Raymond;It might be.{w} If we can kill the cultists before Lachesis blesses them and then take their place...{w} We might just be able to turn things in our favor.
